H0.text: Which sportsman won the fourth series of the British television show ‘Strictly Come Dancing’ in 2006. Darren Gough

H1.text: Which sportsman won the fourth series of the British television show ‘Strictly Come Dancing’ in 2006. Phil Tufnell

H2.text: Which sportsman won the fourth series of the British television show ‘Strictly Come Dancing’ in 2006. Matthew Hoggard

H3.text: Which sportsman won the fourth series of the British television show ‘Strictly Come Dancing’ in 2006. Mark Ramprakash

A4.text: Mark Ramprakash and Karen Hardy were announced as the winners on 23 December
